desc.#text: This is a record of the things that a person feels it is important to communicate about their needs, strengths, values, concerns and preferences to others providing support and care.

name.#text: What is most important to me
People who are important to me
How I communicate and how to communicate with me
How and when to support me

desc.#text: This is a record of the date that this information was last updated.
Where relevant, this is a record of name, relationship/role and contact details of the individual who supported the person to write this section e.g. carer, family member, advocate, professional.
